column4: i want to connect via network an ubuntu computer with a windows 7 computer but i have problems with access the data from ubuntu with samba can anybody help?
you have to turn off the workgroup only sharing on windows 7
makes it less secure, about the same as XP, you still have password protection
how can i do that, i have made accesable an folder in "options" for "everybody" but cant acess in nautilus under "network"
